name: vibe
description: Stream and download videos from google drive in an instant. No ads. No bullshit.

scripts.electron-dev: SET DEV=true && concurrently "npm run start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.electron-mac: export DEV=true && concurrently "npm run start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.pack-win: npm run build && npm run bundle-server && electron-packager . --overwrite --icon=assets/icon.ico --ignore="(server/.credentials|.gitignore|server/gitignore|src*|server/img/.*|server/.temp|public|server/server.js|/server/store.json|/server/downloaded/.*)"
scripts.pack-osx: npm run build && npm run bundle-server && electron-packager . --overwrite --icon=assets/icon.icns --ignore="(server/.credentials|.gitignore|server/gitignore|src*|server/img/.*|server/.temp|public|server/server.js|/server/store.json|/server/downloaded/.*)"
scripts.pack-all: npm run build && npm run bundle-server && electron-packager . --all --overwrite --icon=assets/icon.ico --ignore="(.gitignore|server/gitignore|src*|server/img/.*|server/.temp|public|server/server.js|/server/store.json|/server/downloaded)"
